Jesus was a fairly common name of the time.
 The James ossuary is of questionable validity. Also, if you take into consideration the percentages of finds that hold those names (Joe, James, Jesus) and the amount of people in the area at the time, it's estimated that there would be at least 4 families with a Joe dad and James/Jesus brothers.
